meanings.definition: The use of living organisms or biological systems to develop products or processes.
meanings.sent1: Biotechnology has helped create new medicines from natural sources.
meanings.sent2: Many companies invest in biotechnology to improve agricultural practices.
meanings.sent3: The farmer joked that his cows were experts in biotechnology because they produced so much milk.
meanings.sent4: In the world of innovation, biotechnology is the artist painting with the colors of life.
meanings.sent5: The classroom buzzed with excitement as the students witnessed the magic of biotechnology in action.

meanings.definition: The application of technology to biological systems for research or industrial purposes.
meanings.sent1: Scientists use biotechnology to study how cells function in the human body.
meanings.sent2: The biotechnology industry plays a crucial role in advancing medical treatments.
meanings.sent3: The chef humorously referred to his high-tech kitchen gadgets as his own form of biotechnology.
meanings.sent4: In the vast ocean of progress, biotechnology is the lighthouse guiding us towards new discoveries.
meanings.sent5: The documentary showcased the incredible impact of biotechnology on modern society.
